section.title: Contact
section.p: There is currently one mailing list for Windstille available:

ul.li: Windstille-Devel mailinglist - discussion of the game development
Windstille-Commit mailinglist - automatic messages of code pieces commited to the source code repository

section.p: In addition to that you can reach me via ICQ (UIN: 59461927) or Jabber (ID: grumbel@jabber.org). You can also find me on IRC: irc.freenode.net, Channel #windstille, Nick: grumbel.
